action.name: Open root window
action.description: Open this directory with a root instance

action.name: Optimize PNG image(s)
action.command: for file in %F; do oxipng --strip all "$file" && dunstify -t 2500 "Image optimization" "Image(s) optimized"; done
action.description: Optimize the selected PNG image(s) with oxipng

action.name: Optimize JPEG image(s)
action.command: for file in %F; do jpegoptim -s -v "$file" && dunstify -t 2500 "Image optimization" "Image(s) optimized"; done
action.description: Optimize the selected JPEG image(s) with jpegoptim

action.name: Convert to JPEG XL
action.command: for file in %f; do cjxl -e 9 -d 0 "$file" "$(basename "$file" | sed 's/\.[^.]*$//')".jxl && dunstify "Image convertion" "$file converted to JPEG XL"; done
action.description: Convert the selected image(s) to JPEG XL
